content: not sure how to do this technique a youtube search for crochet weave in end will provide several tutorial videos enjoy your finished hat coupon code 50% off any 1 future pattern purchase halfoffpattern www etsy com/shop/acorntreecreations subscribe to the acorn tree blog for free patterns articles and more http //www acorntreecreations com/ any 4 patterns from acorn tree crochet just $10 00 https //www etsy com/listing/122588965/choose-any-4-crochet-patterns any 2 patterns from acorn tree crochet just $5 00 https //www etsy com/listing/122589054/choose-any-2-crochet-patterns questions please email acorntreecreations@gmail com copyright jenny thomas acorn tree creations 2012 yes even free patterns are protected by copyright this pattern including all text and photos remains the property of acorn tree creations your purchase grants one individual the license to use it to create crocheted projects to keep donate gift or sell sharing or selling the pattern itself in any form partial or whole is illegal but you are welcome and encouraged to share a link to www acorntreecreations com/shop where others can access the pattern directly images from the site and pattern may not be used in any form without expressed written permission you must take your own product photos if selling finished items made with this or any acorn tree pattern thank you
